name: 謝佳玲
objective: 本課程旨在訓練學生撰寫英文科技論文之技巧，內容包括：(1)介紹英文科技論文常用之語法、文體與修辭風格(2)說明英文論文之標準組織架構，並提醒英文論文寫作之常犯錯誤，透過有效實作提昇科技論文的可讀性。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Unit 1: Research
3. Sentence Type
4. Unit 2: Introduction
5. Sentence Type
6. Unit 3: Introduction
7. Unit 4: Introduction
8. Noun Clause
9. Midterm Exam
10. Unit 5: Method
11. Unit 6: Material
12. Relative Clause
13. Unit 7: Results
14. Unit 8: Discussion
15. Participle Clause
16. Unit 9: Abstract
17. Compound Adjective
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Class attendance, lesson preparation, class participation: 10%
2. PowerPoint assignments: 20%
3. Oral presentations: 20%
4. Exams: 50%
materials:
1. Weissberg, R. and S. Buker. 2005. Writing Up Research: Experimental Research Report Writing for Students of English. Taipei: Pearson Education Taiwan Ltd.
2. Chia-Ling Hsieh. English for Science & Technology.
